SELECT P.PURCHASE_ID AS purchaseId,P.PROJECT_ID AS projectId,P.MATERIAL_MX_ID AS materialMxId,P.SORT_NO AS sortNo,P.QUANTITY AS quantity,P.MATERIAL_ID AS materialId,P.PRICE AS price,M.MATERIAL_CODE AS materialCode, M.NAME AS name,M.UNIT AS unit,M.BRAND AS brand,M.MODEL AS model,(SELECT C.SORT_NAME FROM PROJECT_BUILD_MATERIAL_SORT C WHERE C.ORG_ID=M.ORG_ID AND C.SORT_ID=M.SORT_ID) AS sortName, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(S.QUANTITY), 0) FROM project_build_material_IN S WHERE S.ORG_ID=P.ORG_ID AND S.MATERIAL_ID=P.MATERIAL_ID) AS inQuantity FROM PROJECT_BUILD_MATERIAL_MX P LEFT JOIN PROJECT_BUILD_MATERIAL M ON P.ORG_ID=M.ORG_ID AND P.MATERIAL_ID = M.MATERIAL_ID WHERE P.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND P.PURCHASE_ID = #{purchaseId}
AND (M.NAME LIKE #{search} OR M.MATERIAL_CODE LIKE #{search})
